name: MoycaWordFamilyFlashCards
0:
”Alexa, open word family flash cards.”
”Alexa, launch word family flash cards.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word family flash cards
des: This application works by prompting the user with a spelled word. The flash card is displayed on an Alexa device like the show but it is not required. The user then reads the word and moves on to the next word. Word Families are words that have a common ending and often rhyme. All words in this skill have short vowels and are great for kids 5-8.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
